code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with 3 days history of moderate heart burn, severe regurgitation and moderate retrosternal chest pain. he is a white male chief data officer aged 52 Ys. o:Height 184 cm, Weight 61.3 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 15, Patient appears anxious a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Omeprazole - 20 mg po bid x 4 week, and ordered Impendence 24 hour pH.
